item.description:
Bar is a great place providing 3 atmopshere. Once you enter, to the right is a brick oven pizza restaurant. There Pizza is great!

 

To the left, is an area i call a "social bar" hardly any place to sit down. You're just up and chatting. If you're lucky you can get a game of pool in.

 

Last in the back they got a club area. DJ is ok there. He plays a little bit of everything. Specials at the bar are good. I can't complain... It'll be a good time. 

I say to start things off, we should get some grub at the pizza restaurant along with drinks. That should start a good vibe until the dance floor opens up or gets a little packed. And then we have a good night till 2am! (sarcastic about the 2am part. Why not til 4am?!?) Anyways, this should be a great time for all of us and for the newbies to feel welcomed.

 

The anticipation for the BAR in New Haven event is over, it is now Scheduled. See you there!

Christian
item.how_to_find_us: Give me a ring or text at 860.357.7264.... Also keep logging in, i'll post time to time where we are located.
item.why: A lot of people have been asking to do a meet up there and for those who haven't experience bar will love it!
item.name: People Have Been Wanting This, So Let's Do it... BAR in New Haven
